posts.post_content: I have many postcards I'd trade, including this terrific 1909-postmarked Bregstone postcard of Cy Young's longtime catcher, Lou Criger, for any Bregstone postcards I'm missing. I'm also interested in purchasing any I still need. The ones I have can be viewed here: [URL="http://www.sportingoregon.com/p839800559"]http://www.sportingoregon.com/p839800559[/URL]

posts.post_title: Bregstone postcard of Lou Criger, St. Louis Browns
